title: !!10/1 - GREAT APART. near Union Sq. NO FEES, PARKING OFF STREET
posting_body: ['Apartment Features:', '• Two-bedroom apartment located on the second and third floor of a two-family home on a very quiet street, with carpet.', '• Modern eat-in kitchen, with nice lighting, gas stove, plenty of cabinets, disposal, fridge.', '• Living room and Dining room open space with hardwood floors.', '• Large, modern, new bathroom.', '• Two large bedrooms, with plenty of closet space (1 in the attic)', '• Parking off street (Great convenience in that area, especially in winder snowy times)', '• Utilities not included.', 'Convenient location:', '• Off Somerville Av.', '• 3-minute walk from Union Sq and 1 mile from Porter Sq.', '• Bus stop right at the corner of Union and Somerville Ave. which will take you to Porter and Harvard Square in minutes', '•', 'Nearby to Cambridge, Medford, Arlington.', '• Lots of shops, convenience stores, and restaurants close by.', 'Rent is $2600 per month.', 'First, Last and security required (Security may be negotiable).', 'Utilities additional.', 'Landlords will do credit and reference checks.', '\u2028\u2028Please email !']
